api_list.api_description: Retrieve a list of all available bike sharing networks.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve location data of NHL games or venues.

query: I want to plan a biking tour that passes NHL game locations. Could you provide a list of bike-sharing networks and NHL venues or game locations across the cities?
